interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: TOUCH IN SOL Best of No Pore Blem Travel Kit - Face Makeup Primer, Big Pores Perfect Cover, Inner-Glowing Skin with Moisture, Long Lasting Makeup's Staying Kit
Review Date: 2021/01/03
Store: Touch in Sol
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Touch in Sol', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Item Volume': '0.5 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '6.46 x 5.39 x 1.14 inches; 5.12 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'no pore blem kit'}
Review Text: I had tried another pore reducing creme from this brand before and liked it, and I felt the same way about these products. They smell nice, and come in attractive packaging. They make your skin look and feel great, and they smell nice. They reduce the appearance of large pores and work well at night or before putting on makeup. These are also handy travel size containers.
Review Title: Good set of skincare items
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Blue Hair Extensions Tape in Human Hair 16" Soft Straight Tape-in Brazilian Hair Extensions 30grams 20pcs Glue Remy Hair Licoville {'Brand': 'Licoville', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '16 Inches', 'Style': 'Straight', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.3 x 4 x 0.7 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '746860435735'} My hair is thin and tends to break off around my shoulders, so I got these for length. I only bought one pack to try them, but will get more. They are super comfortable, don't bother me when sleeping, haven't fallen out or anything, and blend into my hair which is dyed pink and purple fairly well. I have bought blue, pink, and purple so far.

However, even though my hair is thin, I will need more than one pack. I'm happy to buy more though, now that I've tried them. I have a looped extensions brush and mostly use dry shampoo so my real hair won't fade too much, but no issues with washing or brushing the extensions. too. Good value and I like them. I was impressed for the price Unny Club Black Square Lipstick (Magenta) | matte lipstick UNNY CLUB {'Brand': 'UNNY CLUB', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Item Form': 'Stick', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '2.8 x 0.91 x 0.87 inches; 1.13 Ounces'} I liked the very creamy texture, seemed to also be nicely pigmented. However, the magenta had more orangish tones than I would have liked. Still, I liked the lipstick and the tube is pretty cool; it is magnetic and the top snaps back on. I'm sure I would like some of the other colors better though. Nice texture TOUCH IN SOL Best of No Pore Blem Travel Kit - Face Makeup Primer, Big Pores Perfect Cover, Inner-Glowing Skin with Moisture, Long Lasting Makeup's Staying Kit Touch in Sol {'Brand': 'Touch in Sol', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Item Volume': '0.5 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '6.46 x 5.39 x 1.14 inches; 5.12 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'no pore blem kit'} I had tried another pore reducing creme from this brand before and liked it, and I felt the same way about these products. They smell nice, and come in attractive packaging. They make your skin look and feel great, and they smell nice. They reduce the appearance of large pores and work well at night or before putting on makeup. These are also handy travel size containers. Good set of skincare items
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Extensions Usage:** User prefers tape-in human hair extensions, focusing on comfort and compatibility with dyed hair (pink and purple).
- **Hair Texture Consideration:** Has thin hair that tends to break, valuing lightweight products that minimize damage and discomfort.
- **Color Variety:** Enjoys experimenting with vibrant colors, having purchased extensions in blue, pink, and purple.
- **Product Satisfaction:** Positive initial experience with their first pack of extensions led to plans for additional purchases, indicating a willingness to invest in effective products.
- **Care Routine:** Utilizes a looped extensions brush and dry shampoo, demonstrating a proactive approach to maintenance and protection of hair color.
- **Value Sensitivity:** Sensitive to pricing versus value, expressing satisfaction with the cost-to-benefit ratio of products.
- **Cosmetic Preferences:** Prefers cosmetics with creamy textures and solid pigmentation, favoring aesthetically pleasing and functional products. Open to trying new shades while avoiding undesirable undertones.
- **Skincare Preferences:** Recently purchased a skincare kit, which received a high rating for its effectiveness in reducing the appearance of large pores. User appreciates attractive packaging and hydrating benefits, indicating a focus on high-quality skincare that enhances skin texture and appearance.
- **Overall Impression:** Values comfort, quality, and effectiveness in both hair extensions and makeup/skincare, seeking products that integrate with their unique style and provide tangible benefits.
